ORC files suggested for fast retrieval - user understands performance optimization

Multi-agent project approach works well for complex systems
Brief confirmations ('got it', 'nvm') when satisfied with direction

Prefers periodic memory saves + fresh chat tabs to avoid analysis paralysis
